entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
